channel.title: Venice 2025 on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Venice 2025 on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Filmmakers Urge Venice to Take Stand on Gaza in Open Letter
item.description: Hundreds of Italian and international artists have called on the Venice film festival to condemn what they describe as genocide and ethnic cleansing in Gaza.

item.title: Filmmakers Urge Venice to Take Stand on Gaza in Open Letter
item.description: Hundreds of Italian and international artists have called on the Venice film festival to condemn what they describe as genocide and ethnic cleansing in Gaza.

item.title: Gus Van Sant to Receive Venice Fest’s Passion for Film Award
item.description: The two-time Oscar nominee will present his latest feature, ‘Dead Man’s Wire’ out of competition in Venice.

item.title: Gus Van Sant to Receive Venice Fest’s Passion for Film Award
item.description: The two-time Oscar nominee will present his latest feature, ‘Dead Man’s Wire’ out of competition in Venice.

item.title: Julian Schnabel to Receive Venice Festival’s Cartier Glory to the Filmmaker Award
item.description: The acclaimed artist and filmmaker will screen his new feature, ‘In the Hand of Dante’ out of competition in Venice.

item.title: Julian Schnabel to Receive Venice Festival’s Cartier Glory to the Filmmaker Award
item.description: The acclaimed artist and filmmaker will screen his new feature, ‘In the Hand of Dante’ out of competition in Venice.

item.title: Ukrainian, Iranian Docs, Kenyan Sci-Fi Set for Venice Days Lineup
item.description: Berlin festival winner Dag Johan Haugerud will head up the jury for this year’s Venice Days competition.

item.title: Ukrainian, Iranian Docs, Kenyan Sci-Fi Set for Venice Days Lineup
item.description: Berlin festival winner Dag Johan Haugerud will head up the jury for this year’s Venice Days competition.
